Quality Standard Management

The module focuses on tangible and intangible dimensions of quality management. The subject covers the various systems and tools required to control food quality from purchasing to storage. Moreover, the module offer a hands on approach on managing quality by practicing the setting of a standards, and designing the required material to train and evaluate employees capabilities in achieving the standard.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Set and define a standard with measure and controllable criteria

+  Set a training plan for manpower to achieve standard.

+  Design control and evaluation tool to measure staff performance towards standards achievement.

+  List the systems required for controlling food quality from ordering to transformation.

+  Draft basic procedures for the control of purchasing, ordering, delivery and storage of food items.

+  Conduct effective inventory, for measurement of food usage and wastages.
